settings.content: Congratulations on your purchase of The Tchibo. This revolutionary machine comes with a Limited 1 Year Warranty. However, if you purchased your machine on or after September 1, 2021, you need to register in order to activate the warranty. You must register within 30 days of purchase. Please fill in the following information to activate the Warranty.

settings.liquid:
Fill out this form to activate the warranty

{%- form 'customer', id: 'warranty-registration', class: 'form' -%} {%- if form.posted_successfully? -%} {%- assign success_message = "Thank you for your registration. We've got you covered for the limited 1 year warranty now." -%} {%- render 'banner', content: success_message, status: 'success' -%} {%- else -%} {%- if form.errors -%} {%- capture error_message -%}{{ form.errors.translated_fields['email'] }} {{ form.errors.messages['email'] }}{%- endcapture -%} {%- render 'banner', content: error_message, status: 'error' -%} {%- endif -%}
{%- render 'input', name: 'contact[first_name]', label: "First name", type: 'text', required: true -%}
{%- render 'input', name: 'contact[last_name]', label: "Last name", type: 'text', required: true -%}
{%- capture label -%}{{ 'general.newsletter.email' | t }}{%- endcapture -%}
{%- render 'input', name: 'contact[email]', label: label, type: 'email', required: true, autocomplete: 'email', enterkeyhint: 'send' -%}
{%- render 'input', name: 'contact[note][Warranty Address line 1]', label: 'Address line 1', type: 'text', required: true -%} {%- render 'input', name: 'contact[note][Warranty Address line 2]', label: 'Address line 2', type: 'text', required: true -%}
{%- render 'input', name: 'contact[note][Warranty ZIP Code]', label: 'ZIP Code', type: 'text', required: true -%}
{%- render 'input', name: 'contact[note][Warranty City]', label: 'City', type: 'text', required: true -%}
{%- render 'input', name: 'contact[note][Warranty State]', label: 'State', type: 'text', required: true -%}
{%- render 'input', name: 'contact[note][Order Number]', label: 'Order number #', type: 'text', required: true -%}
{%- render 'input', name: 'contact[note][Serial Number]', label: 'Serial number #', type: 'text', required: true -%}
{%- render 'input', name: 'contact[note][Purchase date]', label: 'Purchase date (MM.DD.YYYY)', type: 'text', required: true -%}
{%- render 'select', name: 'contact[note][Purchase location]', label: 'Where did you purchase The Tchibo?', options: ' ', required: true -%}
{%- render 'button', type: 'submit', content: 'Submit Warranty Registration', size: 'xl', background: section.settings.button_background, text_color: section.settings.button_text_color -%} {%- endif -%} {%- endform -%}
